attributes.action: The Government to action against climate change and the 1.5 degree increase
attributes.additional_details:
Reforestation and renewables can aid the reduction of global C02 significantly. Individuals can also make changes to home insulation, food waste and product purchase to reduce C02. 

I ask that the Government make reforestation and renewable energy a priority on the Government agenda. I also ask that they provide a national campaign to encourage all citizens to know how they can best reduce C02 including home insulate, product purchase and food waste to reduce C02 drastically. We need to act now. 
Climate Change: The Facts https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/m00049b1
attributes.background: Sir David Attenborough’s ‘Climate Change: The Facts’ predicts that we only have until 2040-2050 to secure and have implemented a climate change plan before the world temperature increases by 1.5 degrees: effecting eco systems, extinction and extreme weather.
